H0.text: June 19, 1903 saw the birth of what legendary NY Yankee, who earned the nickname The Iron Horse in his 16 years playing for the team, until he was forced to retired when he was stricken with an eponymous disease. Babe Ruth

H1.text: June 19, 1903 saw the birth of what legendary NY Yankee, who earned the nickname The Iron Horse in his 16 years playing for the team, until he was forced to retired when he was stricken with an eponymous disease. Joe DiMaggio

H2.text: June 19, 1903 saw the birth of what legendary NY Yankee, who earned the nickname The Iron Horse in his 16 years playing for the team, until he was forced to retired when he was stricken with an eponymous disease. Yogi Berra

H3.text: June 19, 1903 saw the birth of what legendary NY Yankee, who earned the nickname The Iron Horse in his 16 years playing for the team, until he was forced to retired when he was stricken with an eponymous disease. Gehrig

A4.text: Henry Louis Gehrig (born June 19, 1903) was an American professional baseball first baseman who played 17 seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the New York Yankees.

A5.text: Gehrig was renowned for his prowess as a hitter and for his durability, which earned him the nickname 'the Iron Horse'.
